forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 65. West southwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 55. Southwest wind 5 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the day awakens under a sunny sky, with a gentle breeze weaving through the air. The forecast offers a high around 65, inviting an easy comfort as the sun explores the pale blue expanse above. Despite the clear morning, the gentle touch of the west-southwest wind carries with it a hint of coolness, wrapping the city in a refreshing embrace. As twilight approaches, the skies will shift to a charming partly cloudy canvas, settling to a mild low of around 55 and heralding a tranquil night.

Presently, hints of fog linger at the edges of this city by the bay, perhaps embracing the familiar contours of the Golden Gate Bridge but leaving the heart of the city unfettered by the mist—a serene and pleasing sight that encourages light layering; perhaps a light jacket or a long-sleeve shirt for comfort against the evening chill. A perfect day may beckon one to take a stroll along the waterfront, sipping coffee while gazing at the dancing waves, or perhaps to gather with friends at a local café, filling the air not only with laughter but also with the spirit of the day, ripe for ordinary joys.
